description:
Solid value and durability to make your backpacking goals a reality. With lots of pockets and burly water-resistant fabric, this pack is designed to keep your overnight and hut trip supplies organized. The long U-shaped zippered opening makes it easy to get inside (so you don’t have to unpack and repack when you’re looking for snacks), and all zippers have glove-friendly pullers. Designed for comfort, an easy-to-adjust padded hipbelt and height-adjustable shoulder harness allow you to fine-tune the fit. Now start planning and find your adventure outside.

  • Main fabric is abrasion-resistant 420-denier nylon with a PFC-free DWR finish and a PU coating for superior weather resistance
  • Airmesh backpanel offers maximum airflow on hot days
  • EVA foam padded hipbelt offers a comfortable carry while pockets stash snacks and other small essentials
  • Padded, contoured ergonomic shoulder straps with a height adjustable sternum strap with safety whistle
  • Load lifter straps on shoulders for fine-tuned adjustments
  • Lid has a top pocket with key clip and underlid zippered mesh pocket
  • Large front stretch mesh pocket for stashing a jacket on the go
  • Dual side mesh water bottles pockets
  • Side compression straps and sleeping pad straps cinch in the load and allow you to attach extra gear
  • Attachment loops and shock cord loops for securing trekking poles or an ice axe
  • Hydration sleeve has a hanger hook and elastic routing strap on the shoulder straps. (Reservoir sold separately)
  • Built-in Recco® Rescue System reflector allows ski patrol and mountain rescue teams to detect and locate it under snow
name: MEC Vista 45L Backpack - Men's
